== Main Inclusion Report for ttf-nafees ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/t/ttf-nafees/ttf-nafees_1.2.orig.tar.gz, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Currently the default Ubuntu installation comes with no decent font to create, edit, modify Urdu documents.
** Nafees Web Naskh is already the most popular (open source) Urdu font among web masters, bloggers, urdu application developers, urdu desktop publishing.  
** With this font available by default Ubuntu becomes out of the box usable for people who want to work with Urdu.  
 0. ''Security:''
** No <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=ttf-nafees|CVE entries]]</nowiki>.
** No <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=ttf-nafees|Secunia history]]</nowiki>.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
** Source code review:
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** Package does not ask any debconf questions higher than priority 'normal'.
** No showstopper <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?src=ttf-nafees|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>.
** Good <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/t/ttf-nafees/|maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki>.
** Active <nowiki>[[http://www.crulp.org/NafeesWebNaskh.html|upstream]]</nowiki>.
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://www.crulp.org/NafeesWebNaskh.html|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper/cdbs/dbs packaging, standard patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
** If this font couldn't be included in Ubuntu Default installation then atleast it should be added as a dependency for following packages language-support-ur, language-pack-ur-base, language-pack-ur, language-pack-gnome-ur-base, language-pack-gnome-ur, language-pack-kde-ur-base, language-pack-kde-ur, openoffice.org-l10n-ur-in
